message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the bigger share, but you get a good chunk to start.
Let's split it 60/40, it's a fair compromise
Let's be reasonable. I'm still willing to take the lion's share, but I'm adjusting my offer to be more appealing.  Think of it as a chance to get something, rather than nothing at all.
I'm willing to compromise further. 70/30 is a more reasonable split, considering the value of the money is decreasing
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to come down a little more, but if we don't come to an agreement soon, we'll both lose a lot of money due to inflation.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still willing to compromise. 75/25 is my final offer. Let's make a deal before we lose everything
